title: Nocturne Buff?
body: As a Nocturne buff I think it would be cool if at lower levels his q was a shorter width and got bigger when upgraded and maybe a faster move speed buff on his q. Also, when he ults he would fear all enemies in range for 1 second because it makes more sense considering what nocturne is. A being of pure darkness

replies.body: i'm fine with noc currently being the only NOT COMPLETELY BROKEN assasin champion. he's pretty good already if you know what you're doing.
